document.full_text: mastercard inc's  first-quarter profit rose 24 percent, beating expectations, as people around the world spent more money and u.s. consumers even started using their credit and debit cards to buy more than the necessities.
document.title: mastercard profit jumps as consumers spend more
lines_and_colors: mastercard inc's  first-quarter profit rose 24 percent, beating expectations, as people around the world spent more money and u.s. consumers even started using their credit and debit cards to buy more than the necessities.
